name: Bankroll [Weekly Game Jam - 153]
description:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Music: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NAKj3HJX_tM

Robot City - Quincas Moreira

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Everything in this cursed Casino is determined by a dice roll

This is my entry for the 153rd Weekly Game Jam on itch.io. 

In this top-down shooter, you play as a randomly chosen playing card who has their RPG-Styled stats determined by April; the girl who rolls the dice. Even the weapon you choose and the Casino-themed enemy types you'll encounter in the hand-crafted dungeon level.

See how you perform with your randomly generated stats, or die and try again by re-rolling!

Can you finish the game with just 1HP?

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
